mapper.insert: insert into cust_user_info (user_id, user_nick_name, user_register_date, user_head_url, user_sex, user_address, user_age, user_birthday, user_desc, user_last_login_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRegisterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userHeadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update cust_user_info set user_nick_name = #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_register_date = #{userRegisterDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_head_url = #{userHeadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=BIT}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_age = #{userAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_desc = #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_last_login_time = #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nick_name, user_register_date, user_head_url, user_sex, user_address, user_age, user_birthday, user_desc, user_last_login_time from cust_user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_id, user_nick_name, user_register_date, user_head_url, user_sex, user_address, user_age, user_birthday, user_desc, user_last_login_time from cust_user_info order by user_id ASC,userCreateDate DESC
